name: Pelepay integration for woocommerce
author: EOI

sections.description:
This plugin will allow you to integrate Pelepay credit card processing into your checkout process with woocommerce store.

Management and initial setup through:

woocommerce -> settings -> payment gateways -> pelepay

Insert your Pelepay account email is mandatory, all the rest comes preconfigured
sections.installation: Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.

short_description: Integrate pelepay CC processing with your woocommerce store
